text: Bayen (ni won wa) ti A fi gbe won dide pada nitori ki won le bi ara won leere ibeere. Onsoro kan ninu won so pe: “Igba wo le ti wa nibi?” Won so pe: “A wa nibi fun ojo kan tabi idaji ojo.” Won so pe: “Oluwa yin nimo julo nipa igba ti e ti wa nibi.” Nitori naa, e gbe okan ninu yin dide lo si inu ilu pelu owo fadaka yin yii. Ki o wo ewo ninu ounje ilu l’o mo julo, ki o si mu ase wa fun yin ninu re. Ki o se pelepele, ko si gbodo je ki eni kan kan fura si yin
